oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Bushmen anoint their heads with //h ra (which is black and sparkling), mixed with fat, and rub their bodies with tt . (L VIII.
7276 rev., note). Tt or 'Roode Klip' is dug out from the mountain side. Precautions to be taken against sorcerers upon these occasions. (L VIII.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ||hara Tto
